programme.title: Calming Mountain Waterfall
programme.desc: A fixed-angle one hour long nature scene of the beautiful Tangle Falls in Jasper National Park, paired with real stereo nature sounds shot on location; although it's a static video, there are a lot of dynamic elements.

programme.title: Moalboal White Beach: Philippines
programme.desc: Exploring the Basdaku Beach in the Philippines.

programme.title: Whiritoa Beach, New Zealand
programme.desc: Discover the raw beauty of this secluded New Zealand beach, surrounded by wildflowers.

programme.title: Inspiring Sights
programme.desc: Discover fall in the Rockies. The lush forests and snow-covered mountaintops offer glimpses of pure wilderness.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways
programme.desc: Footage of the rocky coast of Shimizu Island in the Philippines.

programme.title: Sunset Sierra Creek
programme.desc: A golden window to the high Sierra mountains.

programme.title: Healing Hawaii: Kauai
programme.desc: A visual and audio journey around the exotic island paradise of Kauai, known as the Garden Isle. 60 different one-minute scenes of nature, slowly transitioning from one to the next.

programme.title: Hawaii Palms + Waves
programme.desc: Featuring a scene of coastal palms, green grass and blue waves in the early morning light and a backdrop of stereo nature sounds; shot on location in Oahu, Hawaii at the Turtle Bay Resort.

programme.title: Relaxing Nature Sceneries
programme.desc: The filmmaker provides a collection of peaceful nature scenes and tranquil vistas that will soothe body and soul.

programme.title: Lombok Beaches: Indonesia
programme.desc: Experiencing the beaches of an Indonesian island set to a peaceful soundtrack.

programme.title: Tiny House by the Coast: Îles de la Madeleine
programme.sub-title: Tiny House by the Coast: Îles de la Madeleine
programme.desc: A lone house looks over the waters of a rocky coast in Îles de la Madeleine, Quebec.

programme.title: Natural Beauty
programme.desc: Footage of Douro Valley, one of Portugal's most scenic wine regions.

programme.title: Moraine Lake Relaxation
programme.desc: Exploring the Moraine Lake in Banff National Park.

programme.title: Relaxing Nature Sceneries
programme.desc: The filmmaker provides a collection of peaceful nature scenes and tranquil vistas that will soothe body and soul.

programme.title: Turtle Paradise
programme.desc: Dive into an undersea world inhabited by the sea turtles; featuring real-time video scenes captured from around the Caribbean, paired with gentle underwater sounds and calming music for relaxation.

programme.title: Sunrise Meditation
programme.desc: Easimg into the day with the sound of lapping waves and breathtaking beaches from around the world.

programme.title: The Soothing Sun
programme.desc: Rejoice and relax in the splendor of the glorious Sun for a full hour, with this new video by David Huting.

programme.title: A Day in Paradise
programme.desc: Filmed in 2013 by David Huting, the tiny island is hidden off the northeastern coast of the outer Fiji Islands (near Taveuni), and boasts a perfect white sandy beach.

programme.title: Tropical Weightlessness
programme.desc: Gently sway in the tropical turquoise waters with a glimpse of blue sky and palm trees.

programme.title: Above the Tulip Fields
programme.desc: Tulip fields as seen from a drone perspective in the windmill-filled country of Holland.

programme.title: Above the Spanish Islands
programme.desc: An aerial voyage over Mallorca and the Canary Islands.

programme.title: Whiritoa Beach, New Zealand
programme.desc: Discover the raw beauty of this secluded New Zealand beach, surrounded by wildflowers.

programme.title: A Day in Mt Rainier 1
programme.desc: Journeying to hidden sections of Mount Rainier National Park in Washington state with pure nature sounds for relaxation.

programme.title: Dazzling Blue Lakeshore
programme.desc: Relaxing on the blue shoreline of New Zealand's famous Lake Pukaki; filmed in January 2017 on New Zealand's South Island.
